Key Match Events: Wesley Madhevere smashed an unbeaten 35 off 18 balls
Quinton de Kock smacked 23 off the first over of the reply
South Africa had reached the total they would have needed off the minimum five overs required to constitute a game in T20 cricket
De Kock hitting a blistering unbeaten 47 off 18 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Dave Houghton said: ‘I understand the need to try and get these games on for the public and TV people and to play in slightly inclement weather to try and get a result, but I felt we overstepped that mark’
Miscellaneous Highlights: The rain was at its heaviest when Ngarava slipped, and the fact play continued for another over, following several minutes of treatment to the stricken bowler, was scarcely believable.
South Africa will feel hard done by as they were cruising in the chase, with De Kock hitting a blistering unbeaten 47 off 18 balls
Others: The match was abandoned due to rain, resulting in a no-result, with each side awarded one point.
